description: a metal book cover with raised relief design, leather binding and held closed by a miniature pencil (b). On opening side string is attached to either corner for carrying. Inside is the dance card for the ball. c Wiener Altelte Neuigkeiten by G. Davis & Co.; reprint of 15 February 1859 for the 50th Anniversary Concordia Ball of 1909. Twelve pages.
title: Concordia ball dance book
